database.name: VIEW ESCM_POREL_ADLNQTY_V
database.view: SELECT ordln.c_orderline_id AS escm_porel_adlnqty_v_id, ordln.c_order_id, ordln.c_orderline_id, ordln.ad_client_id, ordln.ad_org_id, ordln.isactive, ordln.created, ordln.createdby, ordln.updated, ordln.updatedby, ordln.line, ordln.c_bpartner_id, bp.name AS supplier_name, ordln.m_product_id, pdt.name AS item, ordln.em_escm_prodescription AS description, ordln.em_efin_c_validcombination_id, vc.em_efin_uniquecode AS unique_code, ordln.priceactual AS unit_price, ordln.qtyordered AS agreement_qty, ordln.em_escm_releaseqty AS released_qty, COALESCE((SELECT sum(ln.qtyordered) AS sum FROM c_orderline ln JOIN c_order ord ON ord.c_order_id = ln.c_order_id WHERE ln.em_escm_agreement_line = ordln.c_orderline_id AND ord.em_escm_appstatus = 'ESCM_IP'), 0) AS inprogress_qty, CASE WHEN ordln.em_escm_issummarylevel = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE COALESCE(ordln.qtyordered, 0) - COALESCE(ordln.em_escm_releaseqty, 0) - COALESCE((SELECT sum(ln.qtyordered) AS sum FROM c_orderline ln JOIN c_order ord ON ord.c_order_id = ln.c_order_id WHERE ln.em_escm_agreement_line = ordln.c_orderline_id AND ord.em_escm_appstatus = 'ESCM_IP'), 0) END AS remaining_qty, 0 AS release_qty, ordln.em_escm_issummarylevel AS summary, ordln.c_uom_id, ordln.em_escm_parentline_id AS parentid, ordln.em_escm_product_category_id, ordln.em_escm_prodescription AS olddescription FROM c_orderline ordln LEFT JOIN c_bpartner bp ON ordln.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN c_validcombination vc ON vc.c_validcombination_id = ordln.em_efin_c_validcombination_id LEFT JOIN m_product pdt ON pdt.m_product_id = ordln.m_product_id WHERE ordln.em_escm_issummarylevel = 'Y' OR ordln.em_escm_issummarylevel = 'N' AND (COALESCE(ordln.qtyordered, 0) - COALESCE(ordln.em_escm_releaseqty, 0)) > 0
